code: import React from'react';import{useSelector}from'react-redux';import{useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{delItem}from'../redux/action/index';import{NavLink}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Cart(){const state=useSelector(state=>state.addItem);const dispatch=useDispatch();const handleClose=item=>{dispatch(delItem(item));};function cartItems(cartItem){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"px-4 my-5 bg-light rounded-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container py-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleClose(cartItem),className:"btn-close float-end","aria-label":"Close"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"row justify-content-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-md-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:cartItem.img,alt:cartItem.title,height:"200px",width:"180px"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"col-md-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:cartItem.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"lead fw-bold",children:["$",cartItem.price]})]})]})]})},cartItem.id);}function emptyCart(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"px-4 my-5 bg-light rounded-3 py-5",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container py-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Your Cart is Empty"})})})});}function button(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{to:"/checkout",className:"btn btn-outline-primary mb-5 w-25 mx-auto",children:"Proceed To checkout"})})});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[state.length===0&&emptyCart(),state.length!==0&&state.map(cartItems),state.length!==0&&button()]});}export default Cart;
